channel.title: Advance on Ormissia's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Advance on Ormissia's Blog

item.title: time
item.description: 时间转换 字符串转时间 time.Parse() 时间转字符串 time.Format() 时间转时间戳 Time.Unix() 时间戳转时间 time.Unix() 计时 朴素方法 startTime := time.Now() //do something time.Sleep(time.Second) duration := time.Since(startTime) fmt.Printf("经过时间：%v\n", duration) //经过时间：1.005046959s 简洁方法 // TimeCost 耗时统计函数 func TimeCost(start time.Time) { duration := time.Since(start) fmt.Printf("经过时间：%v\n", duration) } defer TimeCost(time.Now()) //do something time.Sleep(time.Second) //经过时间：1.005054375s 优雅方法 // TimeCost 耗时统计函数 func TimeCost() func() { start := time.Now() return func() { duration := time.Since(start) fmt.

item.title: go mod
item.description: go get 下载指定版本 go get github.com/ormissia/go-opv@v0.0.2
